attributes.action: Put Bury back in Lancashire where she belongs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1974 was a terrible years for our little market town. We were forced against our will to lose our proud Lancastrian identity, forced to become Mancunians.
We urge you to reverse this decision and put us back where we belong.Give us back our identity. The great majority of Bury residents still address ourselves as living in Lancashire, lets make it official.
